Router All.description: This method is just like the router.METHOD() methods, except that it matches all HTTP methods (verbs).

Router GET.description: Routes HTTP GET requests to the specified path with the specified callback functions.

Router POST.description: Routes HTTP POST requests to the specified path with the specified callback functions.

Router PUT.description: Routes HTTP PUT requests to the specified path with the specified callback functions.

Router DELETE.description: Routes HTTP DELETE requests to the specified path with the specified callback functions.
